Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my conservatory and happened to look up to the sky. I saw two bright orange lights hovering in the sky, then they disappeared into the distance then one after another three more came from the same place, exactly the same thing happened they hovered and then disappeared. At that moment I range my friend and told her, then again three more, one after each other, then hovered before disappearing in to the distance. I tried several times to take a picture on my mobile, I will check the as soon as possible! Absolutely amazing! I am a convert!!
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Liverpool
There were no other sightings in Liverpool on or around April 30th 2009
Summary: Bright orange round shaped objects moved across the sky right to left and were static for a while then disappeared into the distance.
